name: Zombie Reactor
description:
Zombie Reactor is a game made for Siberian Game Jam 2020 in 48 hours by AmAteurs Club. It is a Tower Defence-like, and your goal is to protect the base from zombie horde.

Zombies attack our precious snacks stash! However, we have a handy-dandy Arc Reactor AM-A 1337 at our disposal! Open its doors to unleash the powerful energy arcs, but be sure to watch your energy level. It slowly replenishes over time, but you can also refill it with bubbles that will drop from some zombies.

Beware, zombies: here comes the ELECTRIFICATION!

Controls:
- LMB to open/close reactor doors and pick up energy bubbles;
- Q/W/E, A/D, Z/X/C to open/close corresponding door if you don't want to use mouse;
- S to close all doors at once.
